column1: prompt

Select the most appropriate synonym. Enormous
A. Monstrous
B. Tiny
C. Magnificent
D. Robust
Perform a mathematical operation. 5 + 50
Determine the role of each pronoun in the sentence I gave him a gift.
Generate a simile comparing a sunset to fiction.

Age: 30
Occupation: Software Engineer
Add 50 to this number. 230

What is the most common type of sneaker for men?
List two measures suitable to improve employee job satisfaction.

Name three common programming languages used for data science.

The butterflies fluttered in the garden with delight.

John used to work for company ABC now he don't.

Generate 2 story ideas with a sci-fi theme.

Gender: Male (60%), Female (40%)
